alert.note: Alert for Herkimer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 09 at 1:42AM EDT until April 09 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THIS MORNING TO THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...West Canada Creek At Kast Bridge. * WHEN...From early this morning to this afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 6.0 feet, Minor flood stage. The river begins to overflow into low lying RV parks. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:15 AM EDT Saturday the stage was 6.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 1:15 AM EDT Saturday was 6.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 6.2 feet early this morning. It will then fall below flood stage late this morning. - Flood stage is 6.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && West Canada Creek Kast Bridge Flood Stage: 6.0 Observed Stage at Sat 1 am: 6.1 Forecast: Sat 2 am 6.2 Sat 8 am 6.1 Sat 2 pm 5.9 Sat 8 pm 5.6 Sun 2 am 5.4 Sun 8 am 5.2 Sun 2 pm 5.0 Sun 8 pm 4.9 Mon 2 am 4.8 Mon 8 am 4.7 Mon 2 pm 4.6 Mon 8 pm 4.5 &&
